desc: You've got tough hands, it'll do some damage. You aren't that intimidating on your own, though. Minimum Damage: 0. Maximum Damage: 2.
headDesc: Captive: Ah...FUCK you! [Socking the captive's jaw is doing the trick.]
chestDesc: [You punch the captive in the chest and knocked the wind out of 'em, but it ain't doing much.]
stomachDesc: Captive: Ough...Fuck! [A fist right in the kidney.]
genitalsDesc: Captive: AGHH Fuck off!!! [That was a terribly unpleasant place to take a fist.]
armsDesc: Captive: Ow, damn.. [You punched the captive in the shoulder.]
legsDesc: [You punched the captive in the knee. Why?]
